thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com
thread.title: John Amprimo

author: John Amprimo
title: John Amprimo
text: Making a foreign currency transfer with OFX is pretty simple. The ability to store details of regular recipients is great. Being provided a comparison of exchange rates with the major banks is reassuring that OFX is the place to get the best deal. Having OFX ring you to verify your order gives me the assurance that there are human eyes on my transaction. While it can be a pain collecting the information, requiring lots of details about the recipient and their bank reassures me the money is going to the right place. It would be nice if OFX also offered traveler cheque facilities as making transfers while overseas can be tricky due to time difference with Australia.
